TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonGroup implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示功能区选项卡上的一组控件。

span.span: Represents a group of controls on a Ribbon tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Studio 将创建对象拖动时**组**控件从**Office 功能区控件**选项卡**工具箱**拖动到功能区设计器。Visual Studio creates a object when you drag a **Group** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer. ## 常规任务Common Tasks 下表列出可用于常见任务的成员。The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks. 可以在设计时执行所有这些任务。All of these tasks can be performed at design time. 可以在运行时加载功能区之前执行其中的一些任务。Some of these tasks can be performed at run time before the Ribbon is loaded. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). |任务Task|成员Member| |----------|------------| |访问组中的控件、 将控件添加到组，或从组中删除控件。Access the controls in the group, add controls to the group, or remove controls from the group.|使用 属性。Use the property.| |将组添加到功能区选项卡。Add a group to a Ribbon tab.|添加到选项卡的集合。Add a to the collection of the tab.| |在内置选项卡上，相对于内置组的位置指定组的位置。Specify the location of a group on a built-in tab, relative to the location of a built-in group.|使用 属性。Use the property.| 你可以创建通过使用在运行时方法对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与组关联的功能区对话启动程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the Ribbon dialog launcher that is associated with the group.

value.span: 与组关联的功能区对话启动程序。

span.span: The Ribbon dialog launcher that is associated with the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能区对话框启动器是组中将显示一个小图标。The Ribbon dialog launcher is a small icon that appears in the group. 当用户单击此图标时，你可以处理事件以打开自定义对话框。When the user clicks this icon, you can handle the event to open a custom dialog box. 默认情况下，组不具有功能区对话框启动器。By default, groups do not have a Ribbon dialog launcher. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md). 你可以使用属性的自定义功能区对话框启动器的行为接口。You can customize the behavior of the Ribbon dialog launcher by using properties of the interface. 例如，若要设置当用户将指针移到对话框启动器图标上方时显示的屏幕提示，使用属性。For example, to set the screen tip that appears when the user moves the pointer over the dialog launcher icon, use the property. 某些属性接口，如属性时，仅适用时最终用户将其添加到快速访问工具栏。Some properties of the interface, such as the property, are only applicable when the end user adds it to the Quick Access Toolbar. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置和属性，它将添加到默认组。The following example shows how to set the and properties on the that is added to the default group. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 添加到默认组`Group1`中所述[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。Add a to the default group `Group1` as outlined in [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md). [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#11](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#11](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 在用户单击组中的功能区对话启动程序时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the Ribbon dialog launcher icon in the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能区对话框启动器是组中将显示一个小图标。The Ribbon dialog launcher is a small icon that appears in the group. 当用户单击此图标时，你可以处理事件以打开自定义对话框。When the user clicks this icon, you can handle the event to open a custom dialog box. 默认情况下，组不具有功能区对话框启动器。By default, groups do not have a Ribbon dialog launcher. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何向功能区组添加对话框启动器以及如何启动使用户可以选择高级的设置，当他们单击在上一个自定义对话框的右下角中的图标。The following example shows how to add a dialog box launcher to a ribbon group and how to launch a custom dialog that enables users to choose advanced settings when they click on the icon in the lower right corner of the . 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 添加到默认组中所述[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。Add a to the default group as outlined in [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md). 3. 如果你使用的 Visual Basic，添加一个新的 Windows 窗体**对话框**到项目的项。If you are using Visual Basic, add a new Windows Form **Dialog** item to the project. 如果你使用的 C#，添加新**Windows 窗体**项，然后将其转换为一个对话框，通过添加**确定**和**取消**到窗体按钮和创建为按钮的单击事件处理程序事件。If you are using C#, add a new **Windows Form** item and turn it into a dialog by adding an **OK** and **Cancel** button to the form and creating event handlers for the buttons' click events. 4. 设置**（名称）**属性到对话框`advancedSettingsDialog`。Set the **(Name)** property of the dialog to `advancedSettingsDialog`. 通过添加控件并设置更多属性，可以自定义对话框。You can customize the dialog by adding controls and setting more properties. 5. 添加到你的代码的事件处理程序。Add the event handler to your code. 6. 将以下方法到的内容放事件处理程序。Place the contents of the following method into the event handler. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.Designer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.Designer.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取一个标识当前组的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that identifies the current group.

value.span: 一个标识当前组的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the current group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，属性具有相同的值属性。By default, the property has the same value as the property. 如果为不指定任何值属性，则 Visual Studio 生成的值属性。If no value is specified for the property, then Visual Studio generates a value for the property. 中的所有组件对象必须具有唯一`Id`属性值。All components in an object must have unique `Id` property values. 属性对应于`id`功能区 XML 文件中的组件的属性。The property corresponds to the `id` attribute of components in the Ribbon XML file.

span.span: Gets the controls in the group.
The collection of controls in the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，但只能在加载功能区之前，你可以将功能区控件添加到组。You can add a Ribbon control to a group at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded. 创建该控件的实例，然后添加到新的控件集合。Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 通过使用功能区设计器可将控件添加到组中，在 Visual Studio 会自动添加到控件组的属性。When you add controls to a group by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the property of the group.

exception.span: 加载功能区后，尝试添加、移除或替换 。

span.span: You try to add, remove, or replace a after the Ribbon is loaded.

summary.span: 获取或设置组的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the group.

value.span: 一个表示该组的键盘快捷键的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快捷键提示必须包含 1 到 3 个字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置组标签所显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the label of the group.

value.span: 通过组标签显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed by the label of the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组的底部将显示标签。The label appears at the bottom of the group. 标签应简短说明组上的控件的共同功能。The label should be a brief phrase that describes the collective functionality of the controls on the group.

summary.span: 获取或设置内置选项卡上的组的位置（相对于选项卡上的内置组）。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of a group on a built-in tab, relative to a built-in group on the tab.

value.span: 一个 ，表示组的位置（相对于选项卡上的内置组）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the group, relative to a built-in group on the tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅当组已在内置选项卡上才起作用。有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 自定义内置选项卡](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab.md)。The property has an effect only if the group is on a built-in tab. For more information, see [How to: Customize a Built-in Tab](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab.md). 只能在加载功能区之前，可以设置属性。The property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示组是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the group is visible.

value.span: 如果组可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the group is visible; otherwise, .
